channel.title: Comments on: Chipper Card Cashback – Earn Fixed 20k Monthly on Chipper Cash

item.title: By: Faruk
item.dc:creator: Faruk
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/chipper-card-cashback/#comment-2183">Hardeywarlex</a>.
What of we that have done previously and received the notification, are we going to still get the Cashback
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Hardeywarlex.

What of we that have done previously and received the notification, are we going to still get the Cashback

item.title: By: Hardeywarlex
item.dc:creator: Hardeywarlex
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/chipper-card-cashback/#comment-2182">Levi</a>.
No,if you are doing the funds rotation on opay,palmpay or branch ..... chippercash is no longer paying cashback for the said fintech apk.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Levi.

No,if you are doing the funds rotation on opay,palmpay or branch ….. chippercash is no longer paying cashback for the said fintech apk.

item.title: By: Levi
item.dc:creator: Levi
item.description: I only got the 5% cash back message after my first funding to Opay it did not come in subsequent transactions is it still valid
item.content:encoded: I only got the 5% cash back message after my first funding to Opay it did not come in subsequent transactions is it still valid

item.title: By: Hardeywarlex
item.dc:creator: Hardeywarlex
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/chipper-card-cashback/#comment-2144">Heyjay</a>.
That simply means you are not eligible for the Cashback.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Heyjay.

That simply means you are not eligible for the Cashback.

item.title: By: Hardeywarlex
item.dc:creator: Hardeywarlex
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/chipper-card-cashback/#comment-2146">Anonymous</a>.
Yes! You have to wait for at least 24 hours before funding the card after claiming it.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Anonymous.

Yes! You have to wait for at least 24 hours before funding the card after claiming it.

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description: Do I need to find the card after 24hours
item.content:encoded: Do I need to find the card after 24hours

item.description: What if I don't have any messages at all?
item.content:encoded: What if I don’t have any messages at all?
